version_description:
What's New:

New Promo Pack events & banners
New heroes
New levels in Campaign and Devils Tower
Add new feature, formation adjustments in Arena & Ace Arena!

What‘s New:
New Hero: Beardy Santa is on his way!
New Expedition Level :"Merry Christmas". Help Santa with his Reindeer problem, collect Red Socks and trade them for rewards in the new festival event!

Game Adjustments:
Optimized Promo Pack Artworks and contents.
Optimized the purchasing process for promo packs.

Bug fixes:
Fixed a bug in Ace Arena that allows deployment of the same hero in different teams.
Fixed a bug in Campaign that drops relic weapons instead of pieces, along with the display glitch.
And some other minor issues.

And last but not least, to our players in Thailand and Indonesia,
สุขสันต์วันคริสต์มาส! and Selamat Natal!
We're adding Thai and Indonesian localization to our game.

What's New:

1. Unlock Orange quality in for Hero Promotion and Gears.
Your heroes can now be promoted to Orange +2.
Gears of orange quality can be redeemed or looted from multiple in-game stores and game modes.
2. Unlock 4-Star Runes.
3. The Hero Relics feature will be unlocked earlier at Team Lv. 19 (from 50).
4. A new difficulty level, "Nightmare" will be added to Campaign mode.
5. UI overhaul for Side Quest mode, adding additional questing unlockable with VIP levels.
6. Optimized the icons in lobby screen so it looks less messy.
7. Awakening Hero Relics will unlock exclusive hero portraits for your team.
8. Adding new prestige portrait frame for champions of Ace Arena, Devils Tower and Power Rankings.
9. New feature: Sharing Gifts
By sharing Hyper Heroes with your friends on Facebook to unlock special rewards.
10.Fixes for several community reported bugs (The issue with Monkey King's Unique Skill is fixed, for real).

What's New:

Adding new channel for player feedback, accessible via player info panel.
Optimized Facebook binding & Account management.
Adding new hero: Leprechaun
Adding new seasonal events for March.
The weekly diamond purchasing event is now changed to daily.
Lowered team level requirement for claiming rewards from Gems of Soar.
Improved Promo Pack Page, now you can swipe between different promo packs and choose which one you like.
Improved display of stats gauge so that they reflects the different between hero classes (There is no actual change to the hero's stats, this is only improvement to the displaying).
You can now deploy a team of only 3 heroes in Arena (Used to be full team only).

Balancing tweaks:
When Carnivala's pet tiglon becomes persistent, it now has 3 skills, that can be used alternatively.
And his damage output is slightly reduced in exchange of his more rapid attacks.

Rooster Rover's finish skill receives a minor damage nerf.

Fixed a bug that the damage dealt by summoned creatures and continuous damage (i.e. burning, poison & bleeding) are not calculated as hero's contribution in statistics (Carnvala's pet Tiglon and Killer flowers of Wisteria are still not included)

What's New:

Adding a new type of Gems of Soar (HERO).
Fixing a bug that keeps the red-dot indicator for new events/rewards, even after the said event has ended.

Daily rewards for VIP players are now moved into a new panel, accessible via lobby, with quick access option to purchase VIP level packs.
Also adding indicators for easier tracking of VIP progress.

New Diamond Box options
Diamond Box (7), Diamond Box (30) and Diamond Box (Endless)

Adding an entrance to the login screen

Changing the unlocking level to Relic Tracker to Level 19

Lobby Icon rearranged:
Some of the events icon are now collapsible after the rewards are collected.

New Game Feature:
Shrines & Sigils

Offer mystic Sigils to shrines of the Ancient Ones, and win their favor in the battles to come.
Accessible via "Mastery" Icon.

New Game Feature: Shrines & Sigils

Offer mystic Sigils to shrines of the Ancient Ones, and win their favor in the battles to come.

Also fixing:
The issue that made the Weakspot system not working in Singleplayer levels.
A data error in Chapter 14 that may crush the game.
And several UI issues.

New Feature: Guardian Sprites

Support your heroes in battle with these powerful companions!

Each Sprite comes with a unique skill set that would evolve as it gets stronger.

The Guardian Sprites would also provide stats bonus to specific heroes in your deployed team.

So pick your hero setup carefully from now on to maximize your advantage.

Also, keep an eye out for the Sprites of your opponents.

The brand-new effectiveness system will help you gain the upper hand if you bring the Guardian Sprite of the right type.



New Feature: Cross-server Tournament

The first cross-server game mode is finally here!

Compete against players from other servers in your region in Arena-style PVP games.

Prove your strength in face of tougher opponents with a chance to win free SS heroes and ShrineSigils!



Also,

New Heroes，

Bug fixes

And UI adjustment inShrine & Sigils panel.

3 new Guardian Sprites are ready to summon into your team:

Talonlurk (Type: Tempest)

Mossward (Type: Fortitude)

Fairwings (Type: Resonance)



[Temporary Removal of Facebook Invitation Event]

After the update, the Facebook Invitation event will be offline for optimization.

It will return soon.

In the meantime, please be sure to claim your unlocked rewards before the update to avoid all possible losses to your progress.





New Halloween Season Artworks

and Improved UI



Balancing Tweak:

Taunting AI-controlled monsters and heroes will no longer lock their ramming direction, instead, it only affects the targeting of their skills.

Bug Fixes:

Fixed a bug in Cross-server tournament that caused the game the freeze in the loading screen.

Fixed a bug in Cross-server tournament that may cause Error 1.

Fixed a bug in Cross-server tournament that sometimes would only match players with others from the same server.

Fixed a glitch that displayed the Mater Tournament panel at the wrong time.

Fixed a display issue in the Ranking panel.

Fixed a bug in Guardian Sprites that caused sprites to gain excessive rage from methods meant for other types.

Fixed an issue in Myth Myriad's skill targeting as defenders in Arena.

New Feature: Ancient Warpath
This new single-player game mode takes your heroes on for a new journey, one that features new challenges from both the enemy and environment.

New Lobby Artworks
We overhauled the lobby menu and relocated the access to some of the features and panels.

New Expansion: Guild Quests
More & harder guild quests are available to you and your guildmates.

& Other Changes & Adjustments

New Feature: Ancient Warpath
This new single-player game mode takes your heroes on for a new journey, one that features new challenges from both the enemy and environment.

New Lobby Artworks
We overhauled the lobby menu and relocated the access to some of the features and panels.

New Expansion: Guild Quests
More & harder guild quests are available to you and your guildmates.

& Other Changes & Adjustments

Bug Fixes:
1. Fixed a display error in Guild Wars ranking ladder
2. Fixed an issue in Relic Gear updating panel that sometimes blocks upgrade actions even when requirements are met.
3. Fixed an issue that sometimes, Anubis's Duat's Denial (cannot-be-killed effect) will not be triggered.
4. Fixed an issue that the HP regen effect of "Vampiric Power Within" (Duc Rock & Pale Earl) may sometimes be unexpectedly interrupted.
5. Fixed an issue in Ace Arena that sometimes, after adjusting the team formation, the assigned Guardian Sprite may be removed from the setup.

WHAT'S NEW:

New Feature: Guild Tasks
This new guild module takes more challenge to your guild members and helps your guild grow faster!

New Feature: Guild Fund
This new function will supply an extra reward for all guild members.

New Expansion: Now you can upgrade your guild to lv.12!

More Welfare: Rewards of Guild Supply & Guild Gift Package have been upgraded!

Adjustments of Heroes: AI Enhancement & More SS heroes joined Hero Finder and Hero Chest

Other Changes & Convenience Enhancement

What's New
 
New Feature: Hero Skin
Equip your Heroes with Skins to modify their appearance and give them stats boost!
 
New Feature: Monthly Skin Event
Loot Skin Token by completing a series of monthly challenges!
 
New Feature: Real-time Cross-server Arena
Battle with other Hero Masters under this real-time, no power-gap, no AI control, cross-server PVP mode!
 
New Feature: Relic Purify
 
New Expansion: New Co-op Expedition Levels
 
Other Changes & Convenience Enhancement

New Feature
-Cheers: Heroes don’t fight on their own. Every Hero will receive Cheers from other Heroes, strengthening their power. Unlock more Heroes to activate Cheers!

Optimization and Enhancements
-Warning Danger: You will now see a warning sign when you’re about to face an enemy stronger than yourself in Campaign.
-Optimized tutorial chapter
